name: Stranded (itch) (TripleRGames)
description:
WEB GL IT'S JUST FOR PREVIEW PURPOSE, PERFORMANCE IS NOT THAT GOOD. FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS BUILD. 

Survive and collect all the needed parts to fix your plane and leave this uncharted island.

Third Person Survival game made for OGA game jam. All the art assets (models, textures and sounds) can be found on opengameart.org (check credits).

OBJECTIVE: COLLECT THE PARTS AND FIX THE PLANE IN ORDER TO LEAVE THE ISLAND

HINT: PARTS ARE NOT SPAWNED IN THE FIRST DAY. MAKE SURE TO CHECK THE POINTS OF INTEREST EVERY DAY.

CONTROLS:

W A S D - move

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - attack/shoot/chop trees

MOUSE SCROLL - rotate while crafting

I - inventory

C - crafting

G - change from TPS to FPS

Q - focus on target in combat

TAB - check stats

Like the game? You can buy a cup of coffee to the developer by using the SUPPORT button.

Have fun and leave your feedback in the comments below.
